description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdhqk","text":"This protocol describes how to use the cryostat to prepare and slice mouse brain and embryo sections for HE staining and following spatial transcriptomic experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"a5jrm","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9761F6C0765211EEBF390A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9761F6C0765211EEBF390A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d9gpp","text":"Mouse embryos were collected from pregnant C57BL/6J female mice at embryonic day 12.5\n(E12.5). Mouse brain was dissected from 8-week-old C57BL/6J male mice;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajcd5","text":"E12.5 pregnant female mice was anesthetized with carbon dioxide, the whole uterus was\ncollected and washed 3 times in ice-cold DPBS;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ee4e5","text":"The yolk sac was collected to extracted DNA for genotyping (identification of sex);\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ne42","text":"The air bubbles were carefully removed with the syringe, and the embryo was placed\nin sagittal position with tweezers;     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4phbi","text":"   \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73cqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":155,"id":416399,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"a2p15\",\"text\":\"embedding method\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywtb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywrb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywsb96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywqb96ef.webp","width":216}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":155,"id":416403,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"3fbqr\",\"text\":\"embedding method\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywxb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywvb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywwb96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywub96ef.webp","width":366}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":155,"id":416407,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"cmn4j\",\"text\":\"embedding method\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw3b96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywzb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw2b96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nywyb96ef.webp","width":222}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45u2m","text":"The location of embryonic eye was circled, and marked the orientation of embryo,\nthen tissues was transferred to a -80℃ freezer for snap-frozen and storage;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2pcq","text":"Before sectioning, tissue block was took out from -80℃ freezer and placed in cryostat (Leica, CM1950) to balance for at least 30 min;  \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6flvs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":263,"id":416411,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"d7jpg\",\"text\":\"Set the chamber temperature (CT) and object temperature (OT).\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw7b96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw5b96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw6b96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw4b96ef.webp","width":197}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19p1b","text":"Cryosections were cut at a thickness of 10 μm, both left eye and right eye can be collected;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu7nu","text":"The structure of the sequenced cryosections were shown in the followed image:\n      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7s3lc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":308,"id":416415,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"e08op\",\"text\":\"HE staining of cryosections. The distance of cryosections was marked.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxbb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw9b96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxab96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyw8b96ef.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":313,"id":416419,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"ea72f\",\"text\":\"HE staining of cryosections.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxfb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxdb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxeb96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxcb96ef.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":245,"id":416423,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"1rrt8\",\"text\":\"HE staining of cryosections.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxjb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxhb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxib96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxgb96ef.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4vnb","text":"8-week-old male mice was anesthetized with carbon dioxide and decapitated;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh9ki","text":"The whole brain was rapidly dissected, numbered and photographed with Motorized\nFluorescence Stereo Zoom microscope;\n  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"924tm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":153,"id":416427,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"afc4h\",\"text\":\"The morphology of mouse brain.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxpb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxmb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxnb96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxkb96ef.webp","width":186}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f4q2","text":"The air bubbles were carefully removed with the syringe, and the brain was placed\nproperly with tweezers;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21g6o","text":"The location of hippocampus was circled, and marked the orientation of brain, then\ntissues was transferred to a -80℃ freezer for snap-frozen and storage;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55t8u","text":"Brain samples of average size and normal phenotype were selected for subsequent cryosection\nand sequencing;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fh7c","text":"Before sectioning, tissue block was took out from -80℃ freezer and placed in cryostat (Leica, CM1950) to balance for at least 1 h;\n ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58gtc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7s0om","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":263,"id":416439,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"42qhf\",\"text\":\"Set the chamber temperature (CT) and object temperature (OT).\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx3b96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxzb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx2b96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyxyb96ef.webp","width":197}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3oeco","text":"The tissue block was smoothly glued to the sample head, and the cerebellum was oriented towards the experimenter, so that the brain was sectioned in coronal position. If necessary, the angle can be fine-tuned so that the blade section is strictly parallel to the cross-section of the tissue block;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6hj6c","text":"Cryosections were cut at a thickness of 10 μm;\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4m53","text":"The structure of the sequenced cryosections were shown in the followed image:\n      HE staining of cryosections. The distance of cryosections was marked.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f55pk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":274,"id":416443,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"49hpl\",\"text\":\"HE staining of cryosections. The distance of cryosections was marked.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx7b96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx5b96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx6b96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx4b96ef.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":318,"id":416447,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"12evj\",\"text\":\"HE staining of cryosections. The distance of cryosections was marked.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyybb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx9b96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyyab96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyx8b96ef.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":255,"id":416451,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"630di\",\"text\":\"HE staining of cryosections. The distance of cryosections was marked.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyyfb96ef.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyydb96ef.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyyeb96ef.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nyycb96ef.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79u1m","text":"HE staining procedure: cryosections were balanced at room temperature for 30 min,
and then fixed with 4% PFA for 3 min. Then, the sections were washed with ddH2O
for 2 min, stained with hematoxylin for 6 min, washed with ddH2O, stained with eosin for 1 min, washed with ddH2O. After that, sections were gradient dehydrated (75% ethyl alcohol for 1 s, 85% ethyl alcohol for 1 s, 95% ethyl alcohol for 1 s, 100% ethyl alcohol for 1 s, 100% ethyl alcohol for 1 min), cleared (xylene for twice), and sealed after airing. Finally, the figure was scanned using Motorized Fluorescence Microscope (Nikon, Ni-E).
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":159,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":224,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":273,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
